name: Cowboy Confetti Salad
description: This is a salad that serves as a meal! Perfect for work or school lunches. The longer it sits, the more the flavours have a chance to blend.

ingredients.name: low sodium black beans or black-eyed peas
bell peppers
ingredients.additionalInstruction: one green and one yellow, preferably

preparation:
1. In Round Steamer, combine rice and water. Microwave, uncovered, on high for 15 min or until tender.   
  2. Meanwhile, prepare dressing. Zest lime, you should have about 1 tsp. Place in small bowl. Slice lime in half. Using 2-in-1 Citrus Press, squeeze in juice. Add oil, dip mix, mustard, and sugar. Whisk to combine. Set aside.   
  3. Drain and rinse beans. Dice peppers, tomato, and onion. If using, slice jalapeño in half, discard seeds; mince.   
  4. Once rice is cooked, gently fluff with a fork. Fold in beans and veggies. Add topping, if desired. Serve at room temperature or chilled.
tips: No Epicure Steamer? No problem! Simply prepare rice on the stovetop. Then, combine all salad ingredients in a large bowl.
